thread.section_title: Enchanting Travels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enchanting Travels | enchantingtravels.com
thread.title: Geoffrey French
thread.title_full: Enchanting Travels reviewed by Geoffrey French

author: Geoffrey French
title: Geoffrey French
text: This is a first rate company from start to finish. No worries here. Trip planning (including choice of hotels) is done in an expert fashion with a range of hotels offered to meet every budget. During the trip "meet and greet" is flawless - drivers and guides are never late. Vehicles provided are clean, comfortable and well serviced. The vehicles are stocked with ample bottled water, snacks and hand cleanser. The guides are friendly and very knowledgeable. We have traveled with this company twice and have only good things to say about them.
